description.en_US: Essential tool for exposing CasaOS services securely to the internet
description.pt_BR: Ferramenta essencial para expor serviços CasaOS com segurança na internet

description.en_US: Access your Plex, Jellyfin or Emby server from anywhere

description.en_US: Secure access to Nextcloud, ownCloud or similar services
description.pt_BR: Acesso seguro ao Nextcloud, ownCloud ou serviços similares

description.en_US: Remote control of Home Assistant, OpenHAB or similar platforms
description.pt_BR: Controle remoto do Home Assistant, OpenHAB ou plataformas similares
